articles.author: MARIA SHERMAN
articles.title: Scooter Braun says he's no longer a music manager, will focus on Hybe duties and his children - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: Instead, he will focus his attention on his current roles: As a board member of Hybe, and CEO of Hybe America, the South Korea entertainment company.  The...
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Scooter Braun, one of the most recognizable names in the music business known for representing artists like Justin Bieber and Ariana Grande, will no longer work as a music manager.
